text:
See discussion in this link
(http://www.nabble.com/Data-URI-Support-for-RTF-ExternalGraphic-tt14906012.html)

DataURIResolver does not properly set system ID which causes a null pointer
exception when the image is loaded using RTF external-graphic src=data:image/...
creator: peter@peterryan.net
jeremias@apache.org
text: This problem doesn't occur anymore since revision 611278 (FOP Trunk).
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
